solution_line_template: He gets {hours_per_day_weekdays}*{num_weekdays}=<<{hours_per_day_weekdays}*{num_weekdays}={sleep_weekdays}>>{sleep_weekdays} hours of sleep on 5 days
He gets {hours_per_day_weekend}*{num_weekend_days}=<<{hours_per_day_weekend}*{num_weekend_days}={sleep_weekend}>>{sleep_weekend} hours the other days
